mutants.original_line: def estimate_investments(rates, total_investment, target_interest, max_iter=10000, tol=1e-2):
mutants.mutated_line: def estimate_investments(rates, total_investment, target_interest, max_iter=10001, tol=0.01):
mutants.code:
def estimate_investments(rates, total_investment, target_interest, max_iter=10001, tol=0.01):
    num_stocks = len(rates)
    investments = [total_investment / num_stocks] * num_stocks
    for _ in range(max_iter):
        curr_interest = sum((i * r for (i, r) in zip(investments, rates)))
        error = curr_interest - target_interest
        if abs(error) <= tol:
            break
        shift_amount = error / max(rates)
        if error > 0:
            max_yld_idx = rates.index(max(rates))
            investments[max_yld_idx] -= shift_amount
        else:
            min_yld_idx = rates.index(min(rates))
            max_yld_idx = rates.index(max(rates))
            investments[min_yld_idx] += shift_amount
            investments[max_yld_idx] -= shift_amount
    return investments

def estimate_investments(rates, total_investment, target_interest, max_iter=10000, tol=0.01):
    num_stocks = len(rates)
    investments = [total_investment // num_stocks] * num_stocks
    for _ in range(max_iter):
        curr_interest = sum((i * r for (i, r) in zip(investments, rates)))
        error = curr_interest - target_interest
        if abs(error) <= tol:
            break
        shift_amount = error / max(rates)
        if error > 0:
            max_yld_idx = rates.index(max(rates))
            investments[max_yld_idx] -= shift_amount
        else:
            min_yld_idx = rates.index(min(rates))
            max_yld_idx = rates.index(max(rates))
            investments[min_yld_idx] += shift_amount
            investments[max_yld_idx] -= shift_amount
    return investments

def estimate_investments(rates, total_investment, target_interest, max_iter=10000, tol=0.01):
    num_stocks = len(rates)
    investments = [total_investment / num_stocks] * num_stocks
    for _ in range(max_iter):
        curr_interest = sum((i ** r for (i, r) in zip(investments, rates)))
        error = curr_interest - target_interest
        if abs(error) <= tol:
            break
        shift_amount = error / max(rates)
        if error > 0:
            max_yld_idx = rates.index(max(rates))
            investments[max_yld_idx] -= shift_amount
        else:
            min_yld_idx = rates.index(min(rates))
            max_yld_idx = rates.index(max(rates))
            investments[min_yld_idx] += shift_amount
            investments[max_yld_idx] -= shift_amount
    return investments
